seed_pair.target: We wanted to know what was going to happen.
seed_pair.known: Queríamos saber qué iba a pasar.

seed_pair.target: Nobody was sure how to answer the question.
seed_pair.known: Nadie estaba seguro de cómo responder la pregunta.

seed_pair.target: What would you do if I asked you to help me?
seed_pair.known: ¿Qué harías si te pidiera que me ayudaras?

seed_pair.target: I wanted her to help you to deal with the arrangements.
seed_pair.known: Quería que ella te ayudara a tratar con los arreglos.

seed_pair.target: I've forgotten the word I was trying to say.
seed_pair.known: He olvidado la palabra que estaba intentando decir.

seed_pair.target: I enjoy the chance to practise speaking with you.
seed_pair.known: Disfruto la oportunidad de practicar hablar contigo.

seed_pair.target: You've done what you needed to do.
seed_pair.known: Has hecho lo que necesitabas hacer.

seed_pair.target: I didn't want to ask you how to say it.
They want to spend more time meeting as a group.
seed_pair.known: Quieren pasar más tiempo reuniéndose como grupo.

seed_pair.target: They think that we need to discuss the problem.
seed_pair.known: Piensan que necesitamos discutir el problema.
